articles.content: If a password reset link fails, request a new link and try from an incognito browser. Verify email and check spam folder.
If 2FA codes are not arriving, confirm phone/email, check spam, and resync time on authenticator apps.
For deliveries ‘In Transit’ > 48 hours without movement, escalate to courier with urgent flag and verify last scanned location.
If a high-value transfer is debited but not credited within 24 hours, initiate a trace with the settlement team and notify the beneficiary’s bank.
For duplicate charges, verify the transaction reference, then initiate a refund workflow within 24 hours.
If 2FA codes are missing, verify email access and spam folder, then re-sync the authenticator app time settings. If still blocked, issue a temporary login within 30 minutes.
